scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Credit Scoring Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct the internal workings of a customer credit scoring model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker sends carefully crafted loan applications to infer the model's decision boundaries and potentially identify sensitive features influencing creditworthiness.
initial_goal: Determine the factors influencing credit score predictions using the existing customer loan application scoring API.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A competitor is attempting to reverse engineer a proprietary credit scoring model used by a major bank to assess loan applications.  The model uses sensitive customer data (income, employment history, debt levels) which would be invaluable to a competitor.
